channel.title: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface
channel.description:
So, what I want to make it say is in red: Donator status:(if donator make it say in green text) Active (if not donator make it say in red) Inactive
Then in another line make it say the player's rank.
I wanted to know how I can make it say like you are an: owner if your rank is owner. Anyone know?

item.title: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:5, topic:424719”]public void customInterface() {
getPA().showInterface(3023);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 3024);//Close Text
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners’ are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2
getPA().sendFrame126(“For help type ::help”, 3028);//Line 3
getPA().sendFrame126(“For a list of commands please type ::commands”, 3029);//Line 4
getPA().sendFrame126(“For the rules please type ::rules”, 3030);//Line 5
if (c.isDonator) {
getPA().sendFrame126(“your a donator”, 3031);
} else {
getPA().sendFrame126(“your’re not a donator”, 3031);//Line 6
}
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3032);//Line 7
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12
flushOutStream();
}

Try that proberly won’t work in this file[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

public void customInterface() {
getPA().showInterface(3023);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 3024);//Close Text
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners’ are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2
getPA().sendFrame126(“For help type ::help”, 3028);//Line 3
getPA().sendFrame126(“For a list of commands please type ::commands”, 3029);//Line 4
getPA().sendFrame126(“For the rules please type ::rules”, 3030);//Line 5
if (c.isDonator) {
getPA().sendFrame126(“your a donator”, 3031);
} else {
send message(“You are not a donator”, 3031);//Line 6 }
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3032);//Line 7
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12
flushOutStream();
}

Try that proberly won’t work in this file

item.source: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface

item.title: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface
item.dc:creator: @hgaits hgaits
item.description:
@hgaits wrote:

Chazion I attempted ur code:

public void customInterface() {
getPA().showInterface(3023);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 3024);//Close Text
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners’ are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2
getPA().sendFrame126(“For help type ::help”, 3028);//Line 3
getPA().sendFrame126(“For a list of commands please type ::commands”, 3029);//Line 4
getPA().sendFrame126(“For the rules please type ::rules”, 3030);//Line 5
getPA().sendFrame126(“if (isDonator) { //checks for donator status
//if this is true, tell em so
send message (“Active”);
} else if {
send message(“You are not a donator);”, 3031);//Line 6
getPA().sendFrame126(”", 3032);//Line 7
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12
flushOutStream();
}

WHEN COMPILING I GOT THESE ERRORS:::::::
src\server\model\players\Client.java:53: error: unclosed string literal
getPA().sendFrame126("if (isDonator) { //checks for donator status
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:53: error: ‘;’ expected
getPA().sendFrame126("if (isDonator) { //checks for donator status
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:56: error: illegal start of type
} else if {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:56: error: ‘;’ expected
} else if {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:57: error: ‘;’ expected
send message(“You are not a donator);”, 3031);//Line 6
^
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
Terminate batch job (Y/N)?

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to add a if rank on my login interface
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

[code=java]if (isDonator) { //checks for donator status
//if this is true, tell em so
} else if {
//tell them they’re not a donator
}

(check for player rights) {
send message("");
} else if {
//check for other player rights
send message("");
}

[/code]
